title: MAKERbuino Building Session 1 @ Junghackertag
description:
Let's build a game console!
[[File:MAKERbuino.jpg|800px]]This is a building session for kids (11+) participating in the Junghackertag. We'll have 10 seats available.Please note that this is not a kit for absolute beginners and that you should have at least some basic experience in soldering.We'll have 10 seats available at ChaosZone.More information [[MAKERbuino|can be found here]].
